name: CAS
description:
CAS :: Customizable Attachment System

Attach a variety of decorative items to your characters and thralls!
This includes: belts, pouches, backpacks, sheathed weapons, layered armor, cloaks, glasses, smoking pipes, etc.
Check the documentation link below for an overview of all features!

|| Documentation || --> https://thraxerrrr.github.io/CAS/
|| Discord || --> https://discord.gg/y8Hba9j
changeNote:
* Added a third back weapon slot (for witcher-style sword sheathing)
* Added wearable glasses (contributed by the inimitable Melonpan)
* Added new belt attachables: coin purse, book, potion bottle
* Added new backpack attachable: bedroll
* Added a toggle to hide all attachments
* Improved drag and drop behaviour in the CAS inventory
* Improved the CAS item icons
* Fixed: unequipping belt or backpack will now also unequip all items attached to them
author: Thraxerrrr
